CodeList.Title: Consumption Tax Category code (Subset of UNCL5305)

Code.Name: Lower rate
Code.Description: Tax rate is lower than standard rate.

Code.Name: Exempt from tax
Code.Description: Code specifying that taxes are not applicable.

Code.Name: Free export item, tax not charged
Code.Description: Code specifying that the item is free export and taxes are not charged.

Code.Name: Services outside scope of tax
Code.Description: Code specifying that taxes are not applicable to the services.
